mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Stuart, John, 1749-1823
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Acknowledges favor of 15th ult. with membership diploma to philosophical society; will be delighted to communicate anything possible to the society; fears no more bones of Megalonyx will be found in cave; mentions again figure of lion carved on rock on Kenawha [sic] with many other figures of bears apparently of great antiquity.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1797 September 6, Greenbrier [County, Virginia] to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
